items.sentence: Tom is the person who taught me how to do this.
Tom isn't the only person who needs to do that.
Tom isn't the only one who didn't say anything.
Tom is the last person who lived in this house.
Tom forgot to put the milk in the refrigerator.
Tom doesn't really care whether he wins or not.
Tom didn't really enjoy eating with us, did he?
Was Tom the one who showed Mary how to do that?
Tom wouldn't do that, so I asked Mary to do it.
Tom waited in the park while Mary was shopping.
Tom says he hopes Mary can get home by herself.
Tom says he expects Mary to get home on Monday.
Tom isn't the only boy invited to Mary's party.
Tom isn't the one who told me where Mary lives.
When I started doing that, Tom told me to stop.
Tom showed the letter he got from Mary to John.
Tom should tell Mary why he enjoyed doing that.
Tom should probably tell Mary he won't do that.
Tom says he thought Mary had already done that.
Tom says he doesn't know what Mary ought to do.
